mapper.select: SELECT rno,rname,rtype,rscore,rscorecount,rarea,raddr1,rtel,ilink,ropentime,rclosetime,num FROM (SELECT rno,rname,rtype,rscore,rscorecount,rarea,raddr1,rtel,ilink,ropentime,rclosetime,rownum as num FROM (SELECT maininfo.rno,rname,rtype,rscore,rscorecount,rarea,raddr1,rtel,ilink,ropentime,rclosetime FROM maininfo,image,reserveinfo WHERE maininfo.rno=image.rno AND maininfo.rno=reserveinfo.rno AND rname LIKE '%'||#{cate}||'%' AND raddr1 LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' AND image.iname LIKE 'Mainimage' ORDER BY maininfo.rno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/15.0) FROM maininfo,image WHERE maininfo.rno=image.rno AND rname LIKE '%'||#{cate}||'%' AND raddr1 LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' AND image.iname LIKE 'Mainimage'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM maininfo,image WHERE maininfo.rno=image.rno AND rname LIKE '%'||#{cate}||'%' AND raddr1 LIKE '%'||#{area}||'%' AND image.iname LIKE 'Mainimage'
